content: What should we call the stream where people ask for help? #issues was the first thought from @Deirdre Kirmis but I could also imagine it being #help or #support or other things. What should we call it?

@Don Sizemore and I decided to call it #troubleshooting. I hope that works for you @Deirdre Kirmis . We can always rename it if need be. Here it is: https://dataverse.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/378866-troubleshooting
Philip Durbin has marked this topic as resolved.
Oh that's great, and makes perfect sense!
